src_original: bodhau cittaṃ karomy eṣa sva-parārtha-prasiddhaye |  utpādayāmi vara-bodhi-cittaṃ nimantrayāmi
iṣṭāṃ cariṣye vara-bodhi-cārikāṃ buddho bhaveyaṃ  jagato hitāya | ( 1 )
iti trir uccāryya praṇidhi-pūrvvakaṃ  sarvva-dharmma-nairātmayaṃ bhāvayed anena mantreṇa |
iti paṭhitvā :  bījaṃ māyopamākāraṃ trai-dhātuṃ ca viśeṣataḥ ,
